title: Is everyone passing from NIOS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear Learner, No no every one does not pass nios. And nios resulted never been 100% either. Some times the (YOY) year on year pass percentage may increase or decrease based on performance of examines. It all depends on the students performane and exam success, so don't take it as a grant that nios students all pass. Prepare well and study well that is the only key to sucesess. Thanking you Gourisanka.S
